name: Rendition: Figma->React Components in one click
description:
Built for developers, Rendition makes life easier by helping you implement designs in code.


In Rendition's plugin, you can press a button and get react components from a design. You can preview this code live in the browser, and then copy the code into your own app.


See how it works: https://youtu.be/3WucRJ7B6h0


Here are a few ways we built Rendition to be unique:

  1. Simple. No GUI to use, just react code in one click.
  2. Flexible. want the code for a whole design? No problem. Want it for just a single group, component, or button? That works too!
  3. Code quality. We built this because existing alternatives didn't generate code that we would feel comfortable shipping.


Our goal is to make life easier for dev teams, so please let us know what you think!
